channel.title: Home on KI6J
channel.description: Recent content in Home on KI6J

item.title: Phasing
item.description: An antenna phasing unit designed for portable operation, inspired by the classic KZ3K article published in the ARRL antenna compendium.

item.title: 2n2222
item.description: When you only want to pay 2 cents for a transistor. Application note with simple example circuits. Includes a good self-biasing, small signal amp design. Published by Fairchild, 1977. ![LINK] (www.drive.google.com) This link above will open an new browser tab directed to a publicly shared Google Drive file.
